Params: {2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Sister, we will take care of the rest of them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Please escort the others to the crossroad up ahead. My team is stationed there and it should be safe.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Oh right, if you see a soldier with his hair tied up, tell him that he's in charge of leading team Oasis now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: "...I won't deliver these kinds of messages! If you have something to tell him, come back alive and tell him yourself!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: '(Ugh, they keep increasing in numbers... This is getting a bit out of hand...)', 4: '1'}
